N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 300.1 - Purpose

State Regulations
(a) To
establish standards for the operation of special housing units (SHU's) at the
department's facilities. Unless otherwise provided, the provisions contained
herein apply to designated special housing units only. (b) Set forth herein are the minimum
conditions of confinement for inmates admitted to SHU's pursuant to Part 301 of
this Title. These inmates shall be housed in an area designed to maximize
facility safety and security. (c) [Reserved]
(d) Whenever the
provisions of any Part of this regulation are inconsistent with the provisions
of a Federal or State court order, such court order will be
controlling. Notes
